roleset.name: to refrain
roleset.note: ABSTAIN-V NOTES: Member of Vncls refrain-69. FNcls Forgoing. (from abstain.01-v)

example.name: both arguments
example.text: The Soviet Union abstained from a U.N. General Assembly vote [0] [*T*-1]to reject Israel 's credentials .
example.arg: from a U.N. General Assembly vote [0] [*T*-1]to reject Israel 's credentials
